levels.description: Rushes forward immediately and targets the closest enemy in the frontal line; Knocks back all nearby enemies <@ba.vup>moderately</>, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK Physical damage and the targets' Movement Speed <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{duration} seconds</>
